editor.blockEditorHelpPanelDesc: You can insert a block either by clicking the + or TAB button on a new line, or typing the following shortcuts or markdown syntax on a new line:

blocks.cssClassesTooltip: This CSS classes will be added as the class attribute of the field

embed.idTooltip: This value will be used as ID of the embed

gallery.idTooltip: This value will be used as ID of the gallery

header.customIdTooltip: Enable this option if you want to use own ID, instead of the auto-generated one

html.idTooltip: This value will be used as ID of the HTML

image.idTooltip: This value will be used as ID of the image

list.idTooltip: This value will be used as ID of the list

paragraph.idTooltip: This value will be used as ID of the paragraph

quote.idTooltip: This value will be used as ID of the quote

separator.idTooltip: This value will be used as ID of the separator

toc.idTooltip: This value will be used as ID of the table of contents

post.configureThemeBeforeGenaratingPreview: You have to configure theme for this website before generating preview of this post.
post.duplicatePostErrorMessage: An error occured during duplicating of selected posts. Please try again.
post.editorBlockInfo: A modern and intuitive editor with shortkey and markdown support to make blogging easy, with no need to worry about HTML or other code elements.
post.editorBlockNotSupportedEditPostInfo: The current theme does not support the block editor used in this post. This post can be not properly rendered on the output files.
post.editorBlockNotSupportedNewPostInfo: The current theme does not support the block editor you want to use. This post can be not properly rendered on the output files.
post.editorMarkdownInfo: This editor supports Markdown syntax as shorthand for producing content quickly; great for extensive, no-frills projects such as documentation.
post.editorWYSIWYGInfo: This editor provides a familiar word-processing experience, with additional tools for users that want to control every aspect of their page content.
post.noPostsMatchingYourCriteria: There are no posts matching your criteria.
post.postSlugLengthWarning: The post slug longer than 250 characters can lead to creation of broken files during the website rendering.
post.postStatusChangeSuccessMessage: Status of the selected posts has been changed
post.postWillNotAppearOnHomepageListMsg: Post will not appear on homepage listing
post.postWillNotAppearOnListMsg: Post will not appear in any generated post lists such as tag or author pages
post.removePostMessage: Do you really want to remove selected posts? It cannot be undone.
post.thisPostIsExcludedFromHomepage: This post is excluded from homepage
post.title: Title

publii.dataCollectionInfo: We do not collect any personal data while you use Publii app; also we do not store, we do not track, we do not allow third parties to collect personally identifiable information about you.
publii.publiiLicenseAgreementInfo:

rendering.errorDuringPreviewCreatinMsg: An error occured during creatin of the preview.
rendering.renderingErrorText: An error occurred during rendering of your website.
rendering.renderingPleaseWait: Please wait while the rendering process is completed.
rendering.selectThemeBeforeCreatingPreviewMsg: You have to select a theme before trying to create a preview of your website. Please go to the website settings and select a theme.

settings.additionalValidElementsInWYSIWYGEditor: Additional valid elements in the WYSIWYG editor
settings.additionalValidElementsInWYSIWYGEditorIn:
If the WYSIWYG editor strips out some tags from your HTML code, here you can add additional allowed elements.
For example: v-select[*],v-dropdown[*] will allow custom v-select and v-dropdown tags with any attributes.
settings.advancedPreviewDesc: Advanced preview allows you to render a website without opening browser
settings.appSettingsSavedMsg: App settings has been successfully saved.
settings.appSettingsSaveErrorMsg: An error occurred during saving the App Settings. Please try again.
settings.authorPageTitleVariables: The following variables can be used in the Author Page Title: %authorname, %sitename.
settings.authorPrefixInfo: Defines the prefix that appears before the author slug in a URL e.g. https://example.com/AUTHOR_PREFIX/author-slug.
settings.authorsPrefixCannotEqualTagsPrefix: Authors prefix cannot be the same as tags prefix.
settings.backupLocationChangedConfirmMsg: The backups storage location has been changed. All new backups will be stored in this directory. If you require access to earlier backups, they may be moved manually to the new directory.
settings.cannotAddIndexHTMLInURLsInfo: Enable this option if you cannot enable loading index.html files by default when catalog on your server is opened.
settings.disableAuthorsPaginationIndexingInfo: If this option is enabled your authors pagination files will be excluded from the sitemap and will get noindex, follow robots metatag.
settings.disableAuthorsPaginationInfo: If this option is enabled your authors pagination won't be generated.
settings.disableTagsPaginationIndexingInfo: If this option is enabled your tags pagination files will be excluded from the sitemap and will get noindex, follow robots metatag.
settings.disableTagsPaginationInfo: If this option is enabled your tags pagination won't be generated.
settings.displayEmptyAuthorsInfo: If this option is enabled authors without posts assigned to them will still have their subpages created and appear on the authors list.
settings.displayEmptyTagsInfo: If this option is enabled tags without posts assigned to them will still have their subpages created and appear on the tags list.
settings.dontIndexThisPage: Ask the search engine not to crawl the whole website.
settings.enableAMPInfo:
AMP (accelerated mobile pages) creates mobile-optimized pages for your static content that render fast.
Please note: when this option is enabled your website will load third-party scripts provided by Google's AMP CDN.
settings.enableMediaLazyLoadInfo: Enable this option if you want to use native lazy loading that lazy loads images, videos and iframes.
settings.enableResponsiveImagesInfo: Enable this option if you want to deliver different sized images at different screen resolutions depending on breakpoints defined through config.json file in a theme's folder.
settings.errorPageFilenameCannotBeEmpty: Error page filename cannot be empty.
settings.errorPageFilenameCannotEqualSearchPageFi: Error page filename cannot be the same as search page filename.,
settings.errorPageTitleVariables: The following variables can be used in the Error Page Title: %sitename.
settings.excludeFilesFromSitemapInfo:
Type a comma-separated list of HTML files or catalogs to exclude from the sitemap.
For example: avoid-this-file.html,avoid-this-catalog-too.
settings.facebookAppIDInfo: Read how to obtain Facebook App ID.
settings.fallbackLogoImageInfo: The logo must fit in a 60 × 600 pixel box.
settings.gdprBehaviourInfo: Remember to place a link with the above anchor in your website navigation or the website content (e.g. <a href="#cookie-settings">Cookie preferences</a>). Otherwise, your website's users might not be able to change their individual cookie preferences.
settings.hideCustomExcerptsOnPostPages: Hide custom excerpts on post pages
settings.hideCustomExcerptsOnPostPagesInfo: If this option is enabled your post pages won't display text which is placed above "Read more" element in the post editor.
settings.homepageNoIndexPagination: If this option is enabled your homepage pagination files will be excluded from the sitemap and will get noindex, follow robots metatag.
settings.howToPrepareYourThemeForGDPRInfo: Enabling the GDPR Cookie Popup requires some additional changes in your theme, especially if you are using third-party scripts. Read how to prepare your theme for GDPR.
settings.imageResizeEngineInfo: The Sharp resize engine is much faster than Jimp, but can cause issues with some images. If you are encountering problems when creating or regenerating thumbnails, please try switching to the Jimp resize engine. Should you wish to use WebP images, then youâ€™ll need to use the Sharp resize engine. Please note that the Sharp resize engine is unavailable on Linux.
settings.leaveBlankForDefaultBackupsDir: Leave blank to use default backups directory
settings.leaveBlankForDefaultPreviewDirectory: Leave blank to use default preview directory
settings.leaveBlankToUseDefaultPageTitle: Leave blank to use a default Page title
settings.leaveBlankToUseDefaultSitesDir: Leave blank to use default sites directory
settings.openDevtoolsInMainW: Open DevTools automatically in the Main Window
settings.pageTitleVariables: The following variables can be used in the Page Title: %posttitle, %sitename, %authorname
settings.paginationPhraseInfo: Defines the phrase used before the page number in a URL e.g. https://example.com/tags/tag-slug/page/2.

password.passwordFieldCantBeEmpty: The password field cannot be empty.

settings.postPageTitleVariables: The following variables can be used in the Post Page Title: %posttitle, %sitename, %authorname.
settings.previewLocationChangedConfirmMsg: The preview storage location has been changed. Note that existing files in this folder will be deleted when a preview of your website is created.
settings.provideFacebookAppID: Please provide Facebook App ID
settings.relatedPostsOptionsInfo: When enabled, related posts will be taken from all tags. When disabled, related posts will only be generated from the same tags as the current post.
settings.saveSearchStateInfo: When enabled, Publii will save the current search results even when creating a new post, allowing you to return to the listing. By default, Publii only saves search results when opening a post to edit.
settings.searchPageFilenameCannotBeEmpty: Search page filename cannot be empty.
settings.searchPageTitleVariables: The following variables can be used in the Search Page Title: %sitename.
settings.showFeaturedImageInfo: Display a post's featured image in the feed.
settings.showFullTextInFeedInfo: Display full text of the post in the feed.
settings.showPostSlugsOnTheListing: Show post slugs on the listing
settings.sitemapLinkInfo: You can find the XML sitemap here: sitemap.xml
settings.siteSettingsSaveDuplicateNameErrorMessag: Provided site name is in use. Please try other site name.
settings.siteSettingsSaveEmptyNameErrorMessage: Site name cannot be empty. Please try other name.
settings.siteSettingsSaveNoKeyringErrorMessage: Publii cannot save settings due to a problem with the safe password storage software. Restart the application and try again. If the problem persists, please report it to our team via the community forum.
settings.siteSettingsSaveNoKeyringErrorMessageLin: Publii cannot save settings as no safe password storage software is installed. Follow the installation instructions for Node Keytar via https://github.com/atom/node-keytar/ and try again. Most likely the libsecret-1-dev and gnome-keyring packages are missing from your system.
settings.siteSettingsSaveSiteNotExistsErrorMessag: Site does not exists. Please restart the application.
settings.siteSettingsSaveSuccessMessage: Site settings have been successfully saved.
settings.sitesLocationChangedConfirmMsg: The sites location has been changed. The new destination folder will be cleared up before moving there your sites files. Do you want to continue?
settings.spellcheckerDoesNotSupportLanguage: The spellchecker does not support your selected website language. We recommend to disable this feature.
settings.tagPageTitleVariables: The following variables can be used in the Tag Page Title: %tagname, %sitename.
settings.tagPrefixInfo:
Prefixes entered here will be added before the tag slug in the URL e.g. https://example.com/TAG_PREFIX/tag-slug.
This prefix is also used to generate tags list page (if supported in your theme) as https://example.com/TAG_PREFIX/index.html.
settings.tagsListPageTitleVariables: The following variables can be used in the Tags List Page Title: %sitename.
settings.tagsPrefixCannotBeEmpty: Tags prefix cannot be empty if pretty URLs are enabled.
settings.themeDoesNotHaveSupportedFeaturesList: Your theme config.json file does not contain supportedFeatures section. Please update or modify your theme to get accurate message about features which are not supported by your currently used theme. Read more about supported features.
settings.themeDoesNotSupport404ErrorPage: Your theme does not support 404 Error page.
settings.themeDoesNotSupportErrorPages: Your theme does not support error pages
settings.themeDoesNotSupportSearchPages: Your theme does not support search pages
settings.themeDoesNotSupportTagsListPage: Your theme does not support Tags list page.
settings.toViewSitemapEnableIndexingInfo: To view sitemap settings please disable the 'Ask search engines to not index this website' option in the SEO Settings tab; the sitemap won't be generated for your website otherwise.
settings.useAsTitlePageTitle: Use as a title page title
settings.useAsTitlePageTitleInfo: When this option is enabled, og:title and twitter:title metatags will contain the page title instead of the post title, tag name or author name.
settings.usePrettyURLsInfo: If this option is enabled your post URLs won't contain the .html suffix e.g. it will change URLs from https://example.com/post.html to https://example.com/post/.
settings.versionParameterInfo: Add version parameter in CSS/JS URLs to skip browser cache. This option can cause that more files than usual will be required to sync during deployment.

site.cloneWebsiteSuccessMsg: Website has been cloned. Switched to:
site.deleteWebsiteConfirmMsg: Do you really want to remove this website? This action cannot be undone.
site.deleteWebsiteSuccessMsg: Website has been removed. Switched to:
site.erroOcurredDuringSiteDatabaseCreationInf: An error occurred during site database creation. Please check your antivirus software and try again. You can also need to remove the invalid website catalog from Publii sites directory.
site.siteLoadingErrorMsg: An error occured during loading the selected website. Please check the website files and try again.
site.siteSettingsSaveSuccessMsg: Site settings has been successfully saved.
site.specifyNameForWebsiteDuplicate: Please specify the new name for the duplicate website:
site.websiteAuthorRequired: author name is required and should contains letters
site.websiteNameAlreadyInUseMsg: The selected name is used by other website. Please try again.
site.websiteNameCantBeEmpty: The website name cannot be empty. Please try again.

sync.accessIDFieldCantBeEmpty: The access ID field cannot be empty
sync.afterInitialSyncSiteWillBeAvailableOnlin: After the initial sync, your website will be available online
sync.apiRateLimitingNote: Disable this option only if you are using Github Enterprise with disabled API rate limiting. Otherwhise disabling this option can cause deployment errors.
sync.apiServerNote: Change this value only if you are using your own GitHub instance (Enterprise edition).
sync.branchFieldCantBeEmpty: The branch field cannot be empty
sync.bucketFieldCantBeEmpty: The bucket field cannot be empty
sync.clickToChangeDeploymentMethod: Click to change currently used deployment method
sync.connectionToServerErrorAdditionalMessage: An error occurred during connecting to the server:
sync.connectionToServerErrorMessage: An error occurred during connecting to the server. Please check your server settings or try again.
sync.connectionToServerErrorText: An error occurred during connecting to server...
sync.connectToServerCantStoreFilesErrorMsg: Error! Application was able to connect with your server but was unable to store files. Please check file permissions on your server
sync.connectToServerErrorMsg: Error! Application was unable to connect with your server.
sync.connectToServerSuccessMsg: Success! Application was able to connect with your server.
sync.deploymentMethodFtpMsg: FTP protocol uses an unencrypted transmission, which means any data sent over it, including your username and password, could be read by anyone who may intercept your transmission. We strongly recommend to use FTPS or SFTP protocols if possible.
sync.deploymentMethodGithubPagesMsg: For detailed information about how to configure a website using Github Page, see online documentation.
sync.deploymentMethodGithubPagesNote:
This will be your Github repository path, which should use the following format: YOUR_USERNAME.github.io/YOUR_REPOSITORY_NAME.
If you are using a custom domain name, set this field to just the custom domain name.
sync.deploymentMethodGitlabPagesMsg: For detailed information about how to configure a website using GitLab Pages, see online documentation.
sync.deploymentMethodGoogleCloudMsg: For detailed information about how to configure a website using Google Cloud, see online documentation.
sync.deploymentMethodNetlifyMsg: For detailed information about how to configure a website using Netlify, see onlinedocumentation.
sync.deploymentMethodS3Msg: For detailed information about how to configure a website using S3, see online documentation.
sync.deploymentSettingDatHyperIpfsProtocolNot: The "dat://", "hyper://" and the "ipfs://" protocol is useful only if you have plans to use your website on P2P networks. Read more about dat://, hyper:// and IPFS
sync.deploymentSettingDoubleSlashProtocolNote: Note: while using "//" as protocol, some features like Open Graph tags, sharing buttons etc. cannot work properly.
sync.deploymentSettingFileProtocolNote: The "file://" protocol is useful only if you are using manual deployment method for the intranet websites.
sync.deploymentSettingRelativeUrlsNote: Note: while using relative URLs, some features like Open Graph tags, sitemaps, RSS feeds, JSON feeds etc. will be disabled.
sync.destinationServerNotConfiguredErrorMessa:
Your website cannot currently be synced as the destination server has not been configured correctly.
Check your server settings to ensure that the correct information has been entered.
sync.destinationServerNotConfiguredErrorText: Make sure the destination server is properly configured.
sync.domainNameNotSetErrorMessage:
Your website cannot currently be synced as the settings appear to lack a domain name.
Check your server settings to ensure a domain name has been entered.
sync.domainNameNotSetErrorText: Make sure the domain name is set.
sync.duringSyncYouCantChangeFilesLocation: During sync process you cannot change files location.
sync.filesNotSyncedErrorMessage: Please check hard-upload-errors-log.txt files using the Tools -> Log Viewer tool.
sync.filesNotSyncedErrorText: Some files were not synced properly.
sync.googleCloudPrefixNote: You can put your website in the subdirectory. Please avoid slash at the beginning (i.e. /blog/) - as it will create additional directory with the empty name. Proper prefix example: blog.
sync.leaveBlankToUseDefaultOutputDirectory: Leave blank to use default output directory
sync.manualOutputFieldCantBeEmpty: The manual output selection cannot be empty
sync.outputDirectoryNote: In the selected directory Publii will create catalog/file {siteName}-files. If it exists - it will be replaced with the new files.
sync.outputTypeNote: Publii will generate a catalog or ZIP/TAR archive with your website. Then you can upload these files to any destination server manually.
sync.parallelUploadsNote: More parallel operations can lead to upload errors on slow internet connections or error 403 due API rate limits.
sync.passphraseForKeyNote: Use this field only if your key needs a passphrase
sync.portFormatNote: The port field cannot be empty and must be a positive integer between 1 and 65535.
sync.previewCatalogDoesNotExistInfo: The preview catalog does not exist. Please go to the App Settings and select the correct preview directory first.
sync.provideFTPPasswordForServer: Please provide your FTP password for the following server:
sync.regionFieldCantBeEmpty: The region selection cannot be empty
sync.remotePathMatchServerOrRootPathNote: Path should match your server path e.g. public_html/, public_html/blog/ or the root path e.g. /home/username/public_html/.
sync.remotePathMatchServerRootPathNote: Path should match your server root path e.g. /public_html/, /public_html/blog/.
sync.repositoryFieldCantBeEmpty: The repository field cannot be empty
sync.requireCertificateForConnection: Require the valid certificate for connection
sync.requireFTPPassAlwaysOnSync: Require the FTP password on every time you sync your site
sync.s3PrefixNote: You can put your website in the subdirectory. Please avoid slash at the beginning (i.e. /blog/) - as it will create additional directory with the empty name. Proper prefix example: blog/.
sync.s3ProviderEndpointNote: The custom endpoint cannot be empty when "Use a custom S3 provider" is set to true
sync.secretKeyFieldCantBeEmpty: The secret key field cannot be empty
sync.serverFieldCantBeEmpty: The server field cannot be empty.
sync.serverGitLabNote: Change this value only if you are using your own GitLab instance.
sync.serverSettingsSaveErrorMsg: Publii cannot save settings due to a problem with the safe password storage software. Restart the application and try again. If the problem persists, please report it to our team via the community forum.
sync.serverSettingsSaveLinuxErrorMsg: Publii cannot save settings as no safe password storage software is installed. Follow the installation instructions for Node Keytar via https://github.com/atom/node-keytar/ and try again. Most likely the libsecret-1-dev and gnome-keyring packages are missing from your system.
sync.serverSettingsSaveSuccessMsg: Server settings has been successfully saved.
sync.siteFieldCantBeEmpty: The Site ID field cannot be empty
sync.syncFTPNoPassowrdMsg: Without password you cannot sync your website. Please try again
sync.syncInProgressMessage: During sync process you cannot change site name.
sync.testConnectionNoPassowrdMsg: Without password you cannot test connection. Please try again
sync.tokenFieldCantBeEmpty: The token field cannot be empty
sync.useCustomS3ProviderNote: Note: AWS is the default S3 provider. While using an alternative provider, you need to fill the "S3 provider endpoint" field.
sync.usernameFieldCantBeEmpty: The username field cannot be empty.
sync.websiteFilesPreparedInfo:
Your website files has been prepared. Use the "Get website files" button below
to get your files in order to manually deploy them.
sync.websiteLinkInvalidMsg: Sorry! The website link seems to be invalid.
sync.websiteSynchronizationInfo:
Any duplicate files or filenames already existing in the destination location
that match the Publii-generated files will be overwritten.
sync.youHaventSelectedAnyThemeInfo: You haven't selected any theme. Please go to the Settings and select the theme first.
sync.yourJSONKeyFieldCantBeEmpty: The JSON key file selection cannot be empty
sync.yourWebsiteIsInSync: Your website is now in sync

tag.createFirstTag: You don't have any tag, yet. Let's create the first one!
tag.leaveBlankToUseDefaultTagPageURL: Leave blank to use a default tag page URL
tag.noMainTagForPostMsg: If the post has tags but no main tag has been set, the first tag alphabetically will be used by default.
tag.noSupportFoFeaturedImagesForTags: Your theme does not support featured images for tags.
tag.noTagsMatchingYourCriteria: There are no tags matching your criteria.
tag.removeTagMessage: Do you really want to remove selected tags?
tag.saveAndPreviewNotAvailableDueToNoSupport: The "Save & Preview" option is not available due to lack of support for tag pages in your theme.
tag.tagDataParsingErrorMessage: An error occurred during parsing tag data for ID:
tag.tagNameCannotBeEmptyErrorMessage: Tag name cannot be empty. Please try other name.

theme.postOptionsInfo: The Post options section allows you to set global options for what extra information should be included in your posts. Changes made in this section will affect all posts on your site, but you can also override the App Settings on the Post Edit screen for each individual post if necessary.
theme.postsPerPageInfo: Use -1 as value if you need to display all posts on page.

theme.tagsPostsPerPageInfo: Use -1 as value if you need to display all tag posts on page.
